website_summaries.verdict: A reclining infant seat, child platform, and multiple ways to ride make this stroller ideal for siblings of varying ages. Affordable and convenient.
pros: Fully reclinable front seat features a swiveling tray for easy in and out
Compatible with Graco Click Connect car seats
Rear is fitted with a comfortable padded seat and a standing platform for older children
Side handles provide added stability while standing
Comes with a child and parent tray
cons: Children seated on the rear bench might find it's a tight squeeze with the front seat fully reclined

customer_reviews.title: In love. Perfect for infant & 6 yr old.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Disney trip, and my 6 year old loves it. Easy to open and close. Britax Be Safe car seat works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Medina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an infant and 2 y/o
customer_reviews.text: We have a baby and a two year old and this stroller works perfect! I was worried about other reviews saying that there was no room for the older child to sit if a carseat was used but I think this is for older kids. My two year old fit perfect on the sit while the baby is on the carseat. Next couple of months my baby will be able to sit on the front which will give more room on the back sit.
customer_reviews.author: JyV

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller. Works great to carry my 3.5yr old and my 5m old. Easy to use. Ride is smooth.
customer_reviews.author: SarahSue

customer_reviews.title: Three Kid Essential
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for what I needed. My 5 and 4 year old just need a little break sometimes when we were walking in the evening or go on an outing to the zoo. We've walked with it nearly everyday and it has been a life saver. I can't imagine being without it now.
customer_reviews.author: Meag

customer_reviews.title: Love the flexibility
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a Disneyland trip and it worked perfectly. We had children ages 1,3,7 and 8 and they all took turns sitting in it. The storage was also really impressive too. It was lightweight enough to load in cars and trams easily, but sturdy enough to carry two children and a backpack. The only cons are: the locking foot brake and the sun shade. You have to push up the brake to unlock it, which can be uncomfortable if you are wearing sandals. The sun shade is a little narrow, not a fully coverage canopy. Edit 6/2/20: Four more Disney trips later and this is STILL a fantastic stroller! It has held up great!!
customer_reviews.author: Igga's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room for toddler to sit on bench with infant seat attach
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is awesome. Easy to assemble and my two year old loves the freedom of being able to get on and off the stroller when he wants. I was a little worried when other reviews said there was no room for the toddler to sit on the padded bench with an infant car seat connected. However, there is plenty of room and my son prefers to sit instead of stand. We have the snug ride click connect infant seat if that matters. It's a really great stroller and makes my life easier, plus the price is amazing. Fits perfectly in the back of our small SUV.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren williams

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect, just needs better sunshade
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for a little while, but it really got a work out when we went to Disney. It held up well on four planes without a scratch or crack! We ordered additional sun shades as the one for the front seat is a little small. The Summer brand fit well (one for the front, one for the back). Other than that, we love the storage of numerous cup holders and a catch-all up top for the parents. Breaks work well. Folds easily. Smooth ride. Front seat reclines nearly flat allowing for naps. The older one can still ride standing up at that point, but not sitting. Fits through all doorways. Nice height handles with comfortable grip.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. My four-year-old loves to have a spot ...
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. My four-year-old loves to have a spot to sit without feeling like he’s in a stroller. He gets tired easily, so this is perfect. This was a lifesaver when we went on vacation particularly through the airport so I didn’t have to carry or chase my one and four year olds, and a place to store all of our stuff. Lots of cupholders which is nice. Only downfall is that you can’t lay the front seat down if someone is sitting in the back, The rear child would have to stand somewhat uncomfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of two

customer_reviews.title: So nice for a growing family
customer_reviews.text: This is so nice! We love graco products but this is outstanding. We have a 6 year old, a 3 year old, and a newborn and his car seat clicks in very easily and the girls love to take turns standing or sitting on the back. Sometimes we bring the lilebaby carrier for the baby then my two older kids stay in the stroller and it’s nice to keep everybody organized. It folds up easily. Still a little large when folded but definitely manageable. It has nice wheels on it and cupholders for both parent and kid and a nice storage compartment underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Howell

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller design, but the wheels make it nearly unusable.
customer_reviews.text: In general, this stroller works well. Baby up front, toddler behind either standing while holding on and facing forward, or sitting facing back. Versatile, easy to fold, easy to pop back out. HOWEVER The wheels are hard plastic, with no shock absorption whatsoever. Unless you're cruising on rubber floor mats, you're going to feel every single bump in the ground. Sidewalks offer a solid one-two punch, as the front wheels, then the back wheels, announce every crack, seam, and gap available. Not pleasant for anyone involved. Sleeping baby? Forget it. Not happening. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Polansky

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my 3 and 7 year old. The 7 year old doesn’t need a stroller but sometimes he needs a place to rest when we’re at amusement parks or on vacation. I on the other hand don’t like to stop what we’re doing and like to go go go! It holds our stuff and if a kid gets sluggish or whiny I throw them in the stroller and we keep going!
customer_reviews.author: Angela W.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic...if only my grandkids would coexist peacefully while they're in it 🙄.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic double stroller! Now if only my grandkids would coexist peacefully while they're in it 🙄. Anyway, Pros: Safe, sturdy, easy to maneuver, easy to collapse, easy to open, easy to load kids, easy to unload kids, good size storage compartment, easily accessible storage compartment, 3 cup holders, kids found it comfortable (the smaller toddler fell asleep in the forward facing seat on 1st trip). Cons: Heavy (but I'm ok with that, because if it were light weight I doubt it would be as safe and sturdy). Wish there was more space between the seats so kids can't reach each other, but if it were bigger, it probably wouldn't fit into the boot of my car.
customer_reviews.author: James & Annie Peattie

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not my favorite stroller...
customer_reviews.text: I’m rather disappointed in this stroller. I thought it would be a lighter and smaller alternative to a double stroller. Even with slightly smaller dimensions, it’s still too heavy to carry with one hand and too bulky to store in the trunk of the car. The biggest design flaw (outside of the bench seat being uncomfortable) is the ability of the child to put their feet on the brakes and wheels. My 2.5yr old can stop our walk in an instant. I’m hoping in time he’ll learn the new rules, but it’s awfully frustrating! I loved the concept, but after a few uses, I wish I would’ve saved the money and bought a quality jogging double stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: Darn
customer_reviews.text: I have a two year old and a two week old. My 2 year old will only last in this for a ride TO the park. I have no way of getting him in (while he’s tired and crank) on the back on that little “seat”/standing part. He needs that front seat part so he can nap. It’s very inconvenient that the car seat has to be on the seat part. They need to make it where the car seat can fit on either side. I ended up having to trade this straight across at a consignment shop for the bigger graco duo version. So baby can be in the front.
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller!! My 3 year old daughter was feeling left out that her new baby brother was using her stroller so I did a lot of research on a double stroller and know that a lot of times she wants to get out and walk, and the bench makes that real easy. This stroller folds easily and is pretty compact and not too heavy. Turns real smooth and is sturdy. The parent tray is nice and deep and the handle is very comfortable. The only thing I don’t like is that it is rough on bumps and the wheels are kinda noisy. But overall a great buy and highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Smooth ride
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is perfect height, and so smooth to drive. The car seat clicks into it nicely. It will be nice when I don't have to use the car seat though, because it doesn't leave a lot of room for my 3 year old on the back. I didn't think it would be that big a deal because she is small, but she doesn't like using it right now. When it folds up the sun cover is awkward, see too me a few tries before figuring the best way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing value for this stroller. It fits perfectly with my graco click connect carseat and even with the carseat in place my daughter has enough room in the front. It is very easy to maneuver and folds easily as well. Love all the cupholders and the basket is easily accessible on the bottom. the front seat (when not in use with carseat reclines back a little. I also love that it is not very big. Some double strollers just look huge!! The only negative is the sunshade is not enough to cover two kids. Otherwise I am happy with this purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: G Sp

customer_reviews.title: Small canopy and basket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stroller for my 2 year old so she could sit or stand and it has the option to lie down in the front seat. I like that it folds up fairly small for a double stroller. The one thing I don't like is that the canopy is so small. It hardly has enough cover for the front seat and has almost no cover for the bench seat. Update: I don't love this stroller. The basket is also very hard to get to and pretty small and the standing child cannot sit while a carseat is in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Lierza

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this double stroller! I bought it when I was pregnant with my third child. It worked great for my two older girls and now it works great with my baby in her car seat- it just clicks right in. My toddler has no problem sitting on the bench seat. It folds up great and fits in the trunk of my mid-sized sedan with room to spare. I can also fit it in my husbands tiny Ford Focus but it does take up the whole trunk. Unfolding it is a little trick, but after doing it multiple times I have gotten the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: FamilyT

customer_reviews.title: So so so so GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: Just put this bad boy together and its FANTASTIC! my almost 3 year old has PLENTY of room to sit and the car seat went in smoothly for my 1 month old. Were ready for some serious walking once the weather is nice!!
customer_reviews.author: Mads0421

customer_reviews.title: Regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be great and yeah, it folds up really small but it is very hard to steer. The weight feels all off even though my kids are not that different in weight. The canopy is always in the way of one of them especially my son who rides in back. It cannot be taken on and off easily. Also, the storage basket is basically impossible to get to and is very small. If the front is even slightly reclined, a kid cannot sit on the bench. I wish I would have spent a little more for a better stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Megan B.

customer_reviews.title: The best!! Perfect for an infant and a big ...
customer_reviews.text: The best!! Perfect for an infant and a big kid! My son is just getting the hang of his bike so he mostly likes to sit on the stroller when we go places! Also, it has a buckle on the seat so it keeps him contained in the mall while I do a little shopping :) I also love that my infant's car seat connects to it and she will be able to grow with this stroller as well. I have even taken it jogging and it did great. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Wallick

customer_reviews.title: Great double stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great double stroller. It was perfect for us because my 2.5 year old has already grew out of wanting to ride in a stroller. with this she sits on the little bench seat and we call it her special seat, she loves it. It fold and unfolds pretty easily, it's not to terribly heavy. It was supper easy to put together and my son's graco carseat clicks right into it. The only thing that's a real negative is it only have one sun visor so my daughter dosnt have shade when she's sitting on the bench part.
customer_reviews.author: Casey C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a toddler and newborn
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a toddler and newborn. We have a Chicco car seat & it works in this stroller! It folds up nicely and takes us less space than the chicco single stroller we have now.
customer_reviews.author: TiffT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stroller, great price!!
customer_reviews.text: I had the Graco Duo Modes before this stroller and I hated it with a passion. It was sooooo heavy and my older kid didn’t ride in the stroller portion so it was really useless. I was hesitant to get another graco stroller but tried it anyway because I have the graco car seat. I was pleasantly surprised when I fell in love with this stroller. The sit and ride feature is plenty of room for my 3.5 year old when the car seat is attached. The ride is WAYYYY better than the Duo Modes. Love this stroller and you can’t beat the price
customer_reviews.author: Christian R

customer_reviews.title: I saw a piece of cloth in front of it was empty
customer_reviews.text: I saw a piece of cloth in front of it was empty! I think A board was missing! It is a good price to purchase this baby double stroller . My 5month baby love to seat inside keep moving. Flexible turning . You can take both tray out . But Front tray no Deep Enough when you drive on the way it will fell off. Back tray it’s ok. The umbrella it’s not big enough for 2seats only for one seat use only .Front seat looks plastic inside thin and hard .heavy product for Graco. One hand fold ,it can not stand must hold on the wall. This product is ok for this price!
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stroller for amusement parks particularly if you have an older child who wants to ride !!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful stroller. Daughter brought it to Disney. Her 8 year old son and 3 year old daughter were able to ride in it. The bench in the back fit the 8 year old with no problem. He even fit in the front when his sister wanted to try the bench. Cup holders in both sections and a storage area on the bottom. Folds easily and can be maneuvered easily Highly recommend it. It’s the only stroller we found that will hold up to 80 pounds. He’s 60 pounds and his sister is 26 pounds Theres also a “roof” over the stroller which was good for the sun and the occasional rain which happened every day
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: This is way better than the jogger
customer_reviews.text: We retired a click connect 2 jogger for this stroller and couldn't be happier. The jogger was longer and maneuvered poorly. This one can take tight turns and be driven readily around the kitchen and living room (middle of winter, below zero & much snow here, so not strolling outside). My only critique is the compromise made to make this a two-fer. The canopy is narrow and always "up", either over infant or toddler side. It has no "down" position & it may not prove useful in the sun. The basket is also hard to access from any direction. The capacity is fine if you can figure out how to get your stuff in and out.
customer_reviews.author: A B Star

customer_reviews.title: Update: love this! Easy to assemble and use
customer_reviews.text: Update: new baby is 8 weeks old and this strollers is SUCH a great tool! We use it almost every day and I’m so glad I purchased this. This was super easy for me to assemble at 38 weeks pregnant with a 3 year old who was VERY willing to be helpful lol. He loved the test drive we took inside and outside. I was weary about the plastic wheels but it moves around on (even wet) grass and gravel and was smooth/easy to steer. he fits well with the car seat. I can’t wait to put it to use with baby #2
customer_reviews.author: boy mom

customer_reviews.title: Currently works for 4 y/o and newborn
customer_reviews.text: This stroller currently works for our 4 year old and newborn. I chose this stroller because it is compatible with our click connect car seat. The back seat is not as comfortable for our 4 year old with the newborn carseat in place, but she is easily distracted and wants in and out of the stroller often so isn't a big deal. It is very easy for the 4 year old to get in and out of the back seat area. The stroller is fairly easy to push but somewhat heavy and bulky which is to be expected for a double stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L.

customer_reviews.title: Good for short outtings solo
customer_reviews.text: It will fit into a honda civics truck and easily fit into an suv. It is heavy which I new buying it but wanted a compact double stroller. It is longer and works for my kids. The length is the same size as a shopping cart. I mainly use it solo for trips to the library. Would not work well for grocery shopping solo as there is literally no place to put groceries. I mainly leave diaper bag in suv as it wouldn't fit in basket. The below basket is pretty useless sadly.
customer_reviews.author: J and H

customer_reviews.title: Nice stroller but the storage (or entry to it) is its biggest flaw
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a bad stroller but the storage is its failure. I can not squeeze in my son's diaper bag, at all. And that, I attribute to the additional seating. I can fit the foldable changing pad. Just to give you an idea of its limitations. Now, what I like about it is that my 3 year old can sit or stand with ease. While a bit uncomfortable to rest his head back, he appreciates being able to sit when he wants to.
customer_reviews.author: Cris D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use!! It slim and easy to turn, but pretty long. Not sure how to avoid that though for a stroller with two kids. Only negative thing is that the toddler/child doesn’t have a back rest on the back seat. I put out Graco car seat connect in this and it worked great, it does take away a little room from the back seat, but it works. And the bottom is easy for storage because you can just push the elastic down to store things. Overall great product and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie S

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stroller! I have a 2 1/2 yo and a 4 month old and they both fit well in this and gives the toddler some independence to choose if she wants to sit or stand or walk. It folds up quickly and easily and not too heavy to lift. It fits perfectly in my small suv. The only thing I dislike is the maneuverability in rougher terrain(grass, hills, etc) the wheels are just not built for terrain especially with 2 kids, much easier with just one kid in stroller but definitely not a deal breaker for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! It is so easy and smooth. The car seat sits nicely and the car seat shade and stroller shade protect the baby. My 4 year old sits or stands and loves it to ride it in. It’s nice pushing two kids in a stroller and not chasing the older kid. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Teena

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed for a toddler and a preschooler
customer_reviews.text: Love this. My kids are tall, Enough space for 4 yr old in back, 2.5 yr old in front. Just what we needed as 2.5 year old won't hold hands and stay close in crowded places, and 4 yr old tires, and sometimes needs somewhere to sit, but likes to walk, so a full on double is no longer necessary. Nice basket size fits a backpack, jackets. Cup holders/trays great for cups and snacks. I put on my canvas attachable pouch with additional pockets, and it eliminates need to carry a purse or fancy pack on outings.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stroller for just what I need it for: picking up my Kindergartener from school with his toddler brother in tow. It has enough cup holders and storage space below for snacks, diapers, and anything else we want to bring along. It sets up in a snap and folds quickly. I do wish it were a bit of a smoother ride and a little easier to maneuver. The small storage holder between the cup holders on the handle isn't quite big enough for my iphone 6, so it is a little annoying while it rattles around. I wish it were a little longer and had a closed top for this storage. Overall, I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Nic413

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this stroller! I have a 4 year old and and 8 month old, and this stroller is perfect for longer trips. It was easy to put together, easy to fold and open up. My 4 year old loves that she has the option to sit or stand, and my infant loves that he's now in a big boy seat and can view everything. I don't have the car seat for this stroller, so I don't use that aspect, but it's still worth it. The only thing that I wish could change is the canopy. It doesn't cover both children when both are in sitting position.
customer_reviews.author: kaapow16

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Folds flat great for my 3 year old and 3 month old. The seat for my toddler isn't very big though. Great for short trips to the store. Once the baby can sit in the front seat will be more comfortable for my toddler. Overall it is great for 2 kids
customer_reviews.author: Tammy J Druschel

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: The transition from one to two children is very difficult. By with the use of this stroller for outing makes things a lot easier. This striker is compact and easy to use. I love that is folds into a small space that can comfortably be stored in the trunk of a car. My toddler loves the autonomy the stroller providers her.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer from Alabama

customer_reviews.title: Definitely the most bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely had a mild panic attack thinking the front arm bar was a separate piece from the cup holders. Instructions were very clear that they’re together and how to separate them but quickly figured that out. Not extremely “light weight” but not overly heavy. Canopy is nice but doesn’t move easily and kind of a pain to detach when storing in the back of my SUV. Overall happy with my purchase and the price. Fits well with my Grace Snugride Snuglock 35 Click Connect purchased this year and easy to put in and out! My 3 year old loves the seat in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Bailie Buckner

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler and newborn
customer_reviews.text: I researched a lot before deciding to buy this stroller and have no regrets on my decision, love this stroller. My son is 3 years old and I have a 2 month old newborn. This stroller has been a lifesaver, my son loves that he can stand or sit. We take it out for walks, and I like that when he's bored he just jumps off and runs/walks alongside me. When he gets tired, he can easily jump back on board, it's perfect for him because it provides him freedom. I like how easy it is to fold, it is a bit big, but again its a stroller for 2.
customer_reviews.author: Rosy

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1 month old and a 2 year old and bought this because I could use my carseat for my infant. I have no major complaints. The carseat fits fine and the umbrella keeps him shaded. My toddler loves how he can get in and out easily. He struggles a little seeing since he is facing backwards, but doesn't complain. He sat in it before I could even get it fully assembled. He was just so excited. It is easy to put away and not too big in my trunk. It is hard to get to the storage underneath, but not a major issue. Only wish it was a little better in grass. For the price it's perfect
customer_reviews.author: Natalie little

customer_reviews.title: Overall good stroller but storage basket is not very functional
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is a little hard to maneuver, especially if you have to go on anything other than sidewalk or pavement. My toddler loves riding in it with my newborn-either standing or sitting. It’s kind of heavy but one of the lightest of these types of strollers. I like it okay...it gets the job done, but I’m not in love. My biggest criticism is the storage basket. It’s really hard to get anything in or out because the seats are in the way.
customer_reviews.author: hapagirl

customer_reviews.title: It works but definitely room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: The toddler seat only works if the front baby seat is set fully up. Folding requires 2 hands for sure. Heavy enough, you'll need both hands to lift and store in your vehicle. No easy way to balance without locking the wheels. Also, the "umbrella" cover is very small so you have to readjust constantly. It works though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this stroller.
customer_reviews.text: I hate strollers. They're clunky, big, dang hassle to fold/unfold, fit in a car, etc. Now this one, this one I am very content. I have a 4-year-old and a newborn and its easiness of use is amazing. A button. One push down. DONE. Just an FYI, the tray at the front has a removable part that needs to come off in order to place the baby car seat. We kept removing the whole tray, and when we didn't we could not understand why it wasn't clicking.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca Durden

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 5yr old and 1 yr old. This is great for taking them to the mall and we even used it at the fair recently. It rides pretty smooth on all terrains. The children face opposite ways when sitting. Front is study enough for a 44lb toddler. Definitely way better than an umbrella stroller. Folds down by use of the handle but cannot stand alone when folded (has to be leaned against something)
customer_reviews.author: Addicted to Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Only one complaint
customer_reviews.text: It is hard for my toddler to sit on the bench comfortably when our baby is in her carrier locked into the front seat. It is better for her to stand when the infant carseat is attached. There is also basically zero storage space, but we knew that purchasing it. The seating space in that position is my only complaint. It is very easy to maneuver and to fold.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Penalo

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use for my large 2 (almost 3 year old) and 1 year old and it’s perfect. They love it and it gets a lot if use! Easily folds up and down, easy to get in and out of my vehicle and lays totally flat, which is great for a stroller. Super afforadable. I will say it’s not a great stroller for long days, like we went to our state fair and my older son got tired and he couldn’t nap in it, but for trips to the mall or walks to the playground, etc. it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby and toddler
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my baby and toddler. Great size, just wish I didn’t have to recline the front seat when having my car seat in it so my baby isn’t laying too far back, toddler can’t sit when front seat is reclined. Also not a big deal but would prefer if the sunshade was a bit bigger, doesn’t do much
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Essential for two kids
customer_reviews.text: This stroller has been a life saver. Having two kids - a five year old and a one year old - it's necessary to have a stroller that they both can ride in. It is roomy yet easy to collapse. I highly recommend this stroller. I love that it has cup holders and a tray for the smallest rider and handles for the biggest rider. The fact that it has two cup holders for mom and dad is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Vanderpool

customer_reviews.title: Great for the grandkids.
customer_reviews.text: This fits in the back of my vehicle just fine and I have a smaller car. The toddler seat/standing area is perfect for my 2 year old grandson. He appreciates being the "big brother" to his younger sibling that sits up front. Secure straps for the front seat and a shade umbrella for the front too.
customer_reviews.author: bee

customer_reviews.title: Good sit and stand stroller for 2 kids
customer_reviews.text: Good sit and stand stroller for 2 kids. My 3 yr old likes to sit on the bench while my newborn is in the carseat strapped it. Only 3 issues I have with it is the under basket is hard to access due to the bench seat, next issue is if your not on paved smooth ground the wheels wobble a lot and the stroller bounces around. Last issue is the shade cover is small and awkward to use, doesn't cover either the baby or toddler fully so I just took it off.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was somewhat more complicated due to lack of detail in the directions. With the help of Google, assembly was made much more simple. That being said- once assembled it is a great stroller. It folds up with one hand in 2 seconds, it fits mely almost two year old and almost 4 year old perfectly. I'm excited to use it in the airport due to the ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Gillies

customer_reviews.title: ... were born and this has been by far the best especially for 2 kids
customer_reviews.text: I have had 4 strollers since my kids were born and this has been by far the best especially for 2 kids!! I have a 5 year old and 7 year old... I used it in Disney World for 6 days... its lightweight! its easy to fold and unfold its compact when folded Maneuverability is fantastic!! comfortable for both kids... enough storage on the bottom and 4 cupholders a bonus. I wish I had this years ago :)
customer_reviews.author: ShauntK

customer_reviews.title: Such a great value. We have this for our 5 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a great value. We have this for our 5 year old and 1 year old. We prefer this style to the side by side. It’s easier to navigate and push. Wish the umbrella was bigger and the seat would come up higher. Daughter likes sitting on the back and there’s enough storage space to throw jackets and a small diaper bag. It’s not fancy by any means and not very shock absorbent but can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kona K

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded to this from my Chicco click connect single stroller that held my car seat and seems to fold up smaller than my old stroller. Absolutely love this stroller highly recommend only complaint I guess I can’t get the diaper bag in the storage basket so I clip to the handle instead
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: This is a great stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit concerned that I would be unhappy in purchasing this stroller based on other customer reviews. However, this stroller does everything I wanted it to do! It is easy to maneuver, it is easy to fold, and it has plenty of room for our click system car seat and our very tall 3 year old. I would order this all over again! Don't be fooled by the reviews...I'm glad I wasn't!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah King

customer_reviews.title: Connect carseat does not fit.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to go with the connect carseat and it does not fit. Disappointed that I can't keep my newborn in his carseat asleep but I absolutely love the stroller for my 18 month old and that my 5yr old can sit/stand. The basket underneath is difficult to access, can be used for shopping bags, but would recommend a purse clip for items you'd need to access more often like a diaper bag/purse.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 and 2 year old and this is great for walks, zoo trips or shopping (in those stupid stores who dont have shopping carts!!). Lightweight, easy to open and close, easy to maneuver, has decent sized storage. The bench part that is where my 4 year old sits. There is a seatbelt for her but she never uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Mariss

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller. It has been a lifesaver with our two little kiddos! It is easy for just one of us to take the kids somewhere, it is easy to maneuver, easy to fold and put away, I could not ask for more in a stroller.
customer_reviews.author: H Ham

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, a bit uncomfortable for the older child.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit longer than I’m used to but that’s alright. I don’t like the shade being in the way when you go to fold it up. I also don’t like that it only shades the front seat area. Also when the older child is seated in the back... the front seat hurts the back/shoulders of the older sitting/standing child. The front seats’ back needs to be able to sit all the way up vertically and it doesn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Audriana Ok

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Wish it had more storage.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is lack of storage. Other than that, a great purchase for families with a slight age gap between children. Conventional double strollers are catered toward families with twins. Not this one. Which is perfect because I have two kids with a 4 year age gap.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby and toddler
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love! Perfect for my toddler to sit, stand, or walk when she pleases while my little one relaxes in the front. My only wish is that the cover was bigger. My little one is a red head with very fair skin and it's a pain trying to move it everytime we slightly shift direction so that she isn't in the sun. Other than that, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin O'Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t for us.
customer_reviews.text: The experience I had with it wasn’t a great one. I appreciate these strollers being able to carry two at once, for different ages, but it was bulky to me. It’s not the easiest thing to maneuver either. The canopy was rather annoying and not enough coverage for both kids. I returned it and got my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bohls

customer_reviews.title: Not room for 2 if using Graco click to connect car seat
customer_reviews.text: The stroller was great for 1 child now that I have my second I can not use the car seat and let my toddler sit, he can only stand due to limited space. I tried reaching out to Graco to see if I could return it and I have never gotten responses. My return window is over through Amazon so now I’m stuck with it. Very disappointed, we normally have great luck with all of our Graco products.
customer_reviews.author: KMead

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is just perfect for us at this time in our lives. We have a newborn and an almost 3 year old who mostly walks but likes to sit every once in a while. Our Graco car seat easily snaps into it and our daughter has the option to sit when she wants on the comfy bench or stand and entertain her baby brother as she faces him in the car seat. Just love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby and preschooler until the wheel broke
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it! It's perfect for my four month old and four year old. The four month old's Graco carseat fits in perfectly and my older son can stand or sit. It's easy to steer and folds up with no issues. Perfect double stroller! Edited 09/2018 We used this stroller a few times and the wheel broke and fell off. I haven't had enough time to order a replacement or figure out what to do about it. Wish we could still use it!
customer_reviews.author: TDLB

customer_reviews.title: Compact enough for my trunk.
customer_reviews.text: Less bulky than many double strollers. I was apprehensive at first about going with a spot to stand since my youngest is 2. We've had no issues though. He loves his seat. One note to the manufacturer a though about design, there could be a little extra space between the front seat and back like 2 inches would really make a difference. Fits well in my car trunk and I can still pack stuff in around it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristhemom

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My biggest complaint is the awkward visor which doesn’t help when you are folding it up either but the rest i love! It’s super smooth and easy to move it’s a little on the bigger and heavy side but I like that my infant carry clicks in verses buying a small different brand that i would have to strap the carrier in
customer_reviews.author: TayRoe

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Hadn't really had a chance to see if I like it since it's missing parts . Not really sure if it was a factory error or it was used. Luckily Graco was super helpful and are shipping me the missing parts. 🤷 I'm sure I'll love the stroller but 3 stars for the inconvenience
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: Great on all terrain and a wonderful help with two kids
customer_reviews.text: Great help with two youngins. Kids love it, takes me two hands to get out of trunk- but it goes through gravels and all sorts of terrains is easy to clean lots of storage great recline. If I could change one thing I'd change the harness system as of currently when it's unbuckled your risking loosing shoulder pads. It fits very nice and snug though which is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi(ca)S

customer_reviews.title: Heavier and bulkier than expected but functional.
customer_reviews.text: It definitely did it’s job for me when I have all the kids together but the way other people talked about it I expected it to be easier to fold and handle, and lighter. It’s a bit bulkier than I expected and it takes some effort to close it and get it in the trunk. I’m sure for a tandem stroller there aren’t many easy to handle options out there. But for the pricepoint it did it’s job. It’s not going to get any more use from us after this so I didn’t want to spend a lot on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very much in love with this. My son who is 2 is claustrophobic and never would ride in a stroller but with the new baby i needed something. This is perfect! It's a bit big but nothing crazy. I drive an f150 so i just throw it in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Christina D'Alessandro

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!! It was pretty easy to put together... no tools required. I did have to have my 50 lb 8 year old bounce on the platform to get it to pop into place but it was easy. The wheels swivel well over our gravel road!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect infant/toddler stroller
customer_reviews.text: Toddler has the option to sit or stand. Toddler seat has a seat strap/buckle. Infant seat can lay back, however when laid completely back the toddler seat is blocked. Easily folds. It's a bit big folded, but I wouldn't consider it bulky.
customer_reviews.author: AshStar

customer_reviews.title: Stroller
customer_reviews.text: this is a very nice stroller. Only complaint is when you have a carseat in the front it cuts into the sitting room in the back and my toddler complains about that. Once baby is big enough to sit without the carseat I'm sure my toddler will be happier
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I've had this stroller for a while now and I got no complaints here. Its lightweight and stylish. The canopy can get in the way when folding but its really a minute issue. My toddler loves riding in the back of it while I have my newborn in the front. It fits my car seat perfectly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wilfredo R

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is probably my best purchase since having 2 little ones. I didn't ever use it with a car seat, so I have no opinion on that, but for a 1 year old and 3 year old it works amazingly. Easy to fold and lift into the trunk of my SUV.
customer_reviews.author: Lew

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed with this stroller it doesn’t have a strap to ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this stroller it doesn’t have a strap to secure car seat in. It doesn’t fit the snug ride as easily as it states I can’t utilize the stand option while car seat is in front. It doesn’t recline that well with car seat in front. Overall not happy with stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is perfect for my 3 and 1 year old! It rolls nicely, is fairly lightweight without feeling cheap, has plenty of storage underneath and cup and snack holders for parents and kids. Extremely simple to assemble out of the box too. My only complaint is the small shade canopy, but I just ordered a universal large canopy (Manito Sun Shade) that will extend the shade and work perfectly for what we need.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stroller! Easy assembly ...you can’t mess up...they make it that way! I have an 18 month old and 6 year old ...she is 43 pounds/(90th percentile/tall...and she loves sitting on the bench. It makes it so nice because I can take them riding on a trail for awhile(I can get my exercise) ...she doesn’t like walking to long or too fast...so this is perfect for her. My daughter was very comfortable in the second seat!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Simon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Would give it 10 stars if i could. Took on a trip to Disneyland and it was a hit. Would buy again for sure
customer_reviews.author: M. Fouty

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller. Very easy to push with two kids and no problems turning. Folding up was simple but it is a bit on the heavy side. I'm using this for a 2 year old and a 6 year old who needs a break from walking sometimes. They both love it and take turns in each seat.
customer_reviews.author: adst

customer_reviews.title: Love it! My 3 yr actually rides in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My 3 yr actually rides in the back . I didn’t think he would but he does. It’s great for outings and events especially that requires a lot of walking. My 10 mon old is happy riding in the front. We went in a trip and even my 5yr old nephew decided to take a seat when my 3yr wanted to walk around. For the price you can’t beat it. It folds up nicely. Fits in the back or front seat well and I have a mid size suv
customer_reviews.author: Cora

customer_reviews.title: The stroller is sturdy, though I miss the larger wheels I had ...
customer_reviews.text: I do wish the shade were a little larger especially once we stop using the infant carseat with it (shortly). But my toddler loves the back seat and usually prefers to sit so he can face/talk to me (I really thought he was going to want to stand all of the time). The stroller is sturdy, though I miss the larger wheels I had on the single stroller of the same brand. It's a little tough if I need to momentarily go in grass or hop a curb on a walk.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Truong

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: We were on the fence about whether or not we needed the 2 person when we had our second, and wish we had gone with this one sooner. Not too big to haul around and maneuvers very well. When they are both sitting they can mess with each other being right there back to back, but not a real issue.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Brown

customer_reviews.title: Made our Disney trip so easy!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a recent trip to Disney and it was the best purchase I could have ever made!! Folds up quickly, stores a lot and the front seat reclines all the way back so my daughter could easily nap .. my only complaint is that the bench seat doesn’t lift so you have to add and remove stored items from the sides. Other than that great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Pucciarelli

customer_reviews.title: A must have for kids plus trips.
customer_reviews.text: It functions perfectly. It was a game changer for our family trip. Was worried i would hate it because of the size. Nope, love it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Fan-flipping-tastic
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing and so does my 4 year old. Especially when we are traipsing around the zoo all day. Super easy to click in the car seat and have your other offspring chill on the back. It is kind of rough loading it in the car because it’s bulky but what can you honestly expect. Also can’t really fit a diaper bag on the bottom but still wouldn’t trade it.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble, but great stroller!
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is what I wanted to a T! However, putting it together wasn’t fun at all. The back tires were a pain And the platform the child stands on in the back was so hard to get snapped into place. Other than that it was all fine!
customer_reviews.author: Kyra Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Loved this item I just wish there was an option to put the baby careseat carrier in the front only because my older son didn’t find the front comfortable for more than 10 min. But light weight & east to use and fold!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bothersome seat
customer_reviews.text: I really like the stroller, is a little heavy but not impossible to carry. My only problem is that the toddler seat is too close to the front seat while using the newborn car seat. My son is small and it still hurts his back as he has to tilt forward in order to sit. Not a fan but I can’t return this stroller anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Gabylunna

customer_reviews.title: Great solid stroller
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several strollers from high end to cheaper brands. This is by far the best. It’s easy to fold and lift. It can fit in the back of my Chevy traverse. I would definitely recommend it if you’re low on trunk space.
customer_reviews.author: jasmine Kaphingst

customer_reviews.title: Decent purchase
customer_reviews.text: It’s light weight enough for its size, but it could never be classified as “light”. Overall, one of the best purchases I’ve made since having my second baby. Toddler loves riding in the back. The canopy could be bigger to cover more area. I never could figure out how to attach the all important drink caddy for my stuff. But I like it and use it all the time
customer_reviews.author: patricia G.

customer_reviews.title: Great great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easier to collapse than my single stroller!! Super easy to push and my kids love it!! I was going to buy the joovi but this has just as good reviews for much cheaper! AND it came with the parent caddy which was a win for me!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Ill be honest, Im not crazy about this stroller. It is heavy and not that easy to maneuver. But it serves its purpose and there is a great amount of room for both of our kids. I might like it better when our smallest can sit up and the carseat will not be needed.
customer_reviews.author: the_bohemian_monk

customer_reviews.title: I love this stroller!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves to sit on the bench and hold the handles. The infant seat clicks in easily when the cup holder is removed. The stroller is so easy to push and turn. I only wish the storage was bigger but I love this stroller very much.
customer_reviews.author: james jones

customer_reviews.title: It works fine but I regret buying it
customer_reviews.text: This is much bigger than you would expect. It works fine but I regret buying it, because I hate pushing it around with just one kid with me, while the other isn't there.
customer_reviews.author: reemlarki

customer_reviews.title: Great "big kid" stroller
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old and we had a vacation planned that included a lot of walking. It worked great for him (4 yes old, 37 lbs). He was able to hop in and out of stroller quick and easy and he liked both front seat, more comfort and back seat . Great stroller for 2 kids or 1 kid w baby carrier
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Seidel

product_meta.title: Graco Roomfor2 Stand and Ride Stroller | Lightweight Double Stroller with Toddler Standing Platform, Gotham
product_meta.description:
Color:Gotham| Item Package Quantity:1The Graco RoomFor2 is ideal for walking and running errands with two children, with front and rear seats that each hold a child up to 50 pounds. The front seat features a multi-position recline, which can be placed in a fully flat position for naptime. Care and Maintenance : Wash removable seat cushion in cold water on delicate cycle and line dry To clean stroller frame, use only household soap and warm water Never Use Bleach. Use light oil if wheels squeak. Folded Depth- 15 inches, Folded Height- 37 inches and Folded Width- 21.5 inches Stroller Depth 34.6 in Stroller Weight 27.18 lb Stroller Width 20.9 in Stroller Height 40 in Stroller Rear Wheel Size 8.0 in Stroller Front Wheel Size 6.7 in

BRAND STORY
By Graco
feature_bullets: Holds 2 children up to 50 pound each , Stroller Rear Wheel Size 8.0 inches , Stroller Front Wheel Size 6.7 inches
Stroller accepts all Graco SnugRide Classic Connect & Click Connect Infant Car Seats
Padded bench seat so child can sit or stand on platform
Multi position, reclining front seat lies flat
Child’s tray with cup holder pivots for no fuss stroller entry
One hand fold with storage latch

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,095 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
